summary: The Department of Housing and Urban Development collects huge amounts of sensitive personal information for its housing, community investment, and mortgage loan programs. HUD often shares this information with affiliated agencies; contractors; and state, local, and tribal groups. HUD isn't taking enough action to protect information exchanged with others. The agency expects external entities to have security and privacy controls for processing, storing, or sharing...
title: Information Security and Privacy: HUD Needs a Major Effort to Protect Data Shared with External Entities
